docs.text: Welcome to my ice cream notebook Purpose The goals of this repository are as follows: Improve record keeping of ice cream making Identify my personal preferences in ice cream composition via experimentation Develop and refine new flavor formulations Conduct meta analysis of ice creams made to date and make pretty graphs
